short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refine your online reading experience with 'grafted' NLP powered brains

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Grafted, a NLP powered chrome extension to accelerate and enhance your Medium blog reading experiences. It helps you to extract keywords and summarizes the Medium article you are currently reading, just like a "grafted" brain working alongside! With the aid from Grafted, you can read through the articles in no time without compromising your understanding. 

Grafted currently support all articles under Medium and Towards Data Science domains. Stay tuned for more upcoming features!
